channel.title: Domain help
channel.description: Ive been searching for about two hours but only found thigns about virtual hosts or whatever and thats not what i need. i need to know how to point my domain to "localhost" or my xamp files. i tried putting localhost my ip and 127.0.0.1 for the name server but its not updating. any ideas?

item.title: Domain help
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:

Ive been searching for about two hours but only found thigns about virtual hosts or whatever and thats not what i need. i need to know how to point my domain to “localhost” or my xamp files. i tried putting localhost my ip and 127.0.0.1 for the name server but its not updating. any ideas?
